text: @realDonaldTrump @realDonaldTrump signed into law S.893 the 5G & Beyond 2020 Act - while PARENTS were distracted by the Coronavirus & 5G was installed in their kids’ classrooms during shutdown! No discussion by their President, local gov, or school was discussed with these PARENTS about safety!
